summary: This simple  replacer removes the radioactive glow around nirnroots, as well as the reflective sheen on the plant itself. Nirnroots now look like regular plants instead of the washed out vanilla versions.
descriptionHtml:
This simpleÂ  replacer removes the radioactive glow around nirnroots, as well as the reflective sheen on the plant itself. Nirnroots now look like regular plants instead of the washed out vanilla versions.

Also included is an optional sound replacer to mute the sound the nirnroots make.
author: WanderRA
